system.description: You use material from the Plane of Shadow to shape a quasi-real, illusory version of a conjuration spell of 3rd level or lower. The spell is 20% real. Creatures that succeed on a Will save recognize it as shadow and take only one-fifth damage from real effects. Disbelievers are unaffected by the shadow's non-damaging effects.
system.savingThrow: Will disbelief (if interacted with); varies; see text
